a1b2c3d4e5f6.title: 2025: LLM Year Review
a1b2c3d4e5f6.summary: A comprehensive review of LLM trends in 2025, including reasoning capabilities, coding agents like Claude Code, and the rise of Chinese open-source models.

b2c3d4e5f6g7.title: AI Coding Product Methodology
b2c3d4e5f6g7.summary: Deep analysis of AI Coding product methodology from Tencent CodeBuddy PM, introducing GENIUS AI framework and Spec Coding concept.

c3d4e5f6g7h8.title: Claude Code Tips and Tricks
c3d4e5f6g7h8.summary: Tips for using Claude Code efficiently: parallel instances, Opus model for quality, sharing knowledge via CLAUDE.md.

d4e5f6g7h8i9.title: Code Review in AI Era: Write Twice, Ship Faster
d4e5f6g7h8i9.summary: A new approach to code development in AI era - prototype first with AI, then production version with proper engineering.

e5f6g7h8i9j0.title: MQ Backlog Solutions Beyond Adding Machines
e5f6g7h8i9j0.summary: Solutions for message queue backlog: partition expansion, consumer optimization, async consumption with batch commits.
